attributes.cardTitle: Magnus Carlsen vs Ian Nepomniachtchi - 2022 World Championship
attributes.cardDescription: A thrilling game in the 2022 World Championship where Magnus Carlsen faced Ian Nepomniachtchi. An intense battle showcasing advanced strategies.
